jalasampadana ha saniparakshawa wadidiyunu kirime wyapruthiya nagadipa gramiya jala sampadana kramaye prathilabha janathawata athpath kota dime uthsawaya nagadipa gramiya jala sampadana kramaye prathilabha janathawata athpath kota dime uthsawaya wyapruthi katayuthu niyamanaya kirima sandaha pamini loka banku dutha pirisa saha wyapruthi adhyaksha en.yu.ke. ranathunga mahathage pradanathwayen 2017.11.14 dina pawathwina. 2018.01.22 dina mema wyapruthi katayuthu nima kirima sandaha niyamithawa thibu athara niyamitha dinata prathama mehi idikirim katayuthu nima kirimata hakiwiya.

ingrisi jathika darshanikayeku wu thomas hobs(1588 – 1679) da minis swabhawaya pilibandawa me ha samana anduru mathayak daruwe, aadi minisage jiwithaya ‘dushkara, prachandakari ha keti’ ekak bawa kiyamini.

meyin awurudu 30 kin pera kalayehi buddha samaya pilibadawa nothibunawu shardyasayak lakwasi bauddha mahajanaya kerehi mekala athiwimata ha amerika aadi desa deshantharayanhi sambuddha samaya pathira yamatath panadura wadaya asahaya hethuwa wu bawa kawuruth piliganna sathyayaki.buddhagame abhiwurdiya pinisa esa mahath wadayak kota analpa upakarayak kala wagishwara mohottiwaththe gunananda sthawira maha swaminwahanseda saha unwahanseta ee pinisa wishesa aadharopakara kala thripitaka wagishwaracharya sipkaduwe shri sumangalabhidhana nayaka sthawira swaminwahanseda, sasana wansalankara kawidhara winayachariya waligama shri sumangalabhidhana nayaka sthawira swaminwahanseda, panadure gunarathana sthawira swaminwahanseda, pradhana dayaka mulika mahathunwana koranelis prera karunarathna mahathmayada pi.
